title: Simple map
description: Demonstrates how a website can be shown in its own clean window.

title: Ping
description: Demonstrating how to interact with other programs from the browsers JavaScript context.

title: Video player
description: Demonstrates the usage of borderless windows, overlay menus and draggable areas.

title: Background pdf
description: Shows how ScChrom can run without stealing the focus, how to inject custom styles and how to create a pdf file. Will create a file named 'Stocks overview [date].pdf' on the desktop.

title: ReCAPTCHA
description: Shows how ScChrom can be used by other programs to let a user solve google reCAPTCHAs.

title: Config file explorer
description: Demonstrates how the FilesystemController can be used. Click on a .sccf file to show its metadata.

title: Customized window
description: Shows a complex borderless window completely build with Html.
